text: Banxin station is a station on the Taipei Metro's Circular line. The station was opened on 31 January 2020. It is located in Banqiao District, New Taipei, Taiwan. ==Station layout== {|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" valign=top| |style="border-bottom:solid
